abstract: The fierce rivalry is ratcheting up as both companies claim superiority in technology used for notebook computers.
snippet: The fierce rivalry is ratcheting up as both companies claim superiority in technology used for notebook computers.
lead_paragraph: SAN FRANCISCO, May 9 — The fierce rivalry between the chip makers Intel and Advanced Micro Devices is ratcheting up as both companies claim superiority in technology used for notebook computers.

headline.main: From Intel and A.M.D., Rival Boasts of Technology
headline.print_headline: From Intel And A.M.D., Rival Boasts Of Technology
